Lack enough support: The claim lacks any evidence or credible sources to support the alleged incident.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Katie Couric banished Hillary Clinton from her set based on an incident that never actually occurred.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the alleged incident was proven to be false and originated from a satirical website.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the severity of the alleged incident by suggesting that Clinton used racist slurs to describe President Obama.
